evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiffs bring this Complaint against the U.S. Department of Homeland Security and the United States of America, and, in her official capacity, Kristi Noem, and state as follows:

extracted.value: Plaintiffs: Individual, described as Susan Webber (enrolled member of Blackfeet Nation and elected representative) and Jonathan St. Goddard (rancher on Blackfeet Nation and enrolled member)

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiff Susan Webber is an enrolled member of the Blackfeet Nation and an elected representative of the Blackfeet and Confederated Salish and Kootenai Nations of Montana.

extracted.value: Plaintiff: Susan Webber, enrolled member of the Blackfeet Nation and elected representative of the Blackfeet and Confederated Salish and Kootenai Nations of Montana

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiff Jonathan St. Goddard is a rancher on the Blackfeet Nation who operates a family place south of Browning. St. Goddard is an enrolled member of the Blackfeet Tribe...

extracted.value: Plaintiff: Jonathan St. Goddard, rancher on the Blackfeet Nation and enrolled member of the Blackfeet Tribe

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Defendant the United States Department of Homeland Security is a cabinet agency within the executive branch of the United States government that has been created by Congress.

extracted.value: Defendant: U.S. Department of Homeland Security, cabinet agency within the executive branch

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Defendant Kristi Noem is the Secretary of the United States Department of Homeland Security and that agency's highest ranking official. She is charged with the supervision and management of all decisions and actions of the agency. She is sued in her official capacity.

extracted.value: Defendant: Kristi Noem in her official capacity as Secretary of the U.S. Department of Homeland Security

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Defendant the United States of America is responsible for the exercise of executive action by the named Defendants and all other agencies that are directed by the Order to take action respecting the imposition of universal tariffs.

extracted.value: Defendant: United States of America, responsible for executive actions under the Canada Orders
